legend_0080_hakase_02a:
It seems that [pknm:1] has regained all of its
powers, except for the power to battle.[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_02b:
It seems that [pknm:1] has regained all of its
powers, except for the power to battle.[npcn:E]
legend_0080_hakase_03a:
It seems it will now be able to [clr:6]dash[clr:0] at high
speeds while you’re riding upon it.[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_03b:
It seems it will now be able to [clr:6]dash[clr:0] at high
speeds while you’re riding upon it.[npcn:E]
legend_0080_hakase_04a:
While you’re riding upon it, it seems it can now
[clr:6]jump[clr:0] higher if you press and hold the B Button.[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_04b:
While you’re riding upon it, it seems it can now
[clr:6]jump[clr:0] higher if you press and hold the B Button.[npcn:E]
legend_0080_hakase_05a:
After it has jumped into the air, you should try
pressing the B Button again. It should [clr:6]glide[clr:0] now.[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_05b:
After it has jumped into the air, you should try
pressing the B Button again. It should [clr:6]glide[clr:0] now.[npcn:E]
legend_0080_hakase_06a:
While riding upon it, it seems you should now be
able to [clr:6]move across water[clr:0].[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_06b:
While riding upon it, it seems you should now be
able to [clr:6]move across water[clr:0].[npcn:E]
legend_0080_hakase_07a:
It should now be able to [clr:6]climb up[clr:0] any vertical
surfaces it grabs on to while you’re riding upon it.[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_07b:
It should now be able to [clr:6]climb up[clr:0] any vertical
surfaces it grabs on to while you’re riding upon it.[npcn:E]
legend_0080_hakase_08a:
[BD06:0]I knew you were the right one to entrust it
to, [trnm:0].[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_08b:
[BD06:0]I knew you were the right one to entrust it
to, [trnm:0].[npcn:E]
legend_0080_friend_02:
Pah... Listen to you. Like you had anything to do
with it.[npcn:6]
legend_0080_hakase_09a: That voice... Arven? Are you there?[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_09b: That voice... Arven? Are you there?[npcn:E]
legend_0080_hakase_10a:
I have been searching so long...for a way to
reach you.[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_10b:
I have been searching so long...for a way to
reach you.[npcn:E]
legend_0080_hakase_11a:
Because...\c
Because no one else can get into my lab but you.[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_11b:
Because...\c
Because no one else can get into my lab but you.[npcn:E]
legend_0080_hakase_12a:
[BD06:0]Please take [trnm:0] back to
the\r
lighthouse\r
with you.\c
To the lab on Poco Path.[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_12b:
[BD06:0]Please take [trnm:0] back to
the\r
lighthouse\r
with you.\c
To the lab on Poco Path.[npcn:E]
legend_0080_hakase_13a: I will reach out once more when you arrive there.[npcn:B]
legend_0080_hakase_13b: I will reach out once more when you arrive there.[npcn:E]
legend_0080_friend_06a:
I guess you probably already know...\c
But that...that’s my mom.[npcn:6]
legend_0080_friend_06b:
I guess you probably already know...\c
But that...that’s my dad.[npcn:6]
legend_0080_friend_07:
Always buried under h[er;is:gs] work, off pursuing h[er;is:gs]
own research. Never at home with me.[npcn:6]
legend_0080_friend_08:
That’s the first time I’ve even heard h[er;is:gs] voice
in years, you know?[npcn:6]
legend_0080_friend_09:
And now what? The first thing I get is to be
treated like some kind of errand boy?[npcn:6]
legend_0080_friend_11:
[BD06:0]But I’m guessing you and [pknm:1]
probably\r
want\r
to go, eh?[npcn:6]
legend_0080_friend_12:
Not gonna lie—I feel like my blood’s boiling,
but...\c
Sure, fine, I’ll get you into the lab. What else can
I do?[npcn:6]
legend_0080_friend_13:
The lab is off Poco Path. At the lighthouse where
you and me first met.[npcn:6]
legend_0080_friend_14:
Come on. Let’s get moving before I change
my mind![npcn:6]
legend_0080_friend_15: [Mom;Dad:gs]... Where’ve you been all this time?[npcn:6]
